about.heroSubtitle: Over twenty years of innovation in security
about.p1: Over twenty years of experience in the security sector, continuous research into innovative materials and solutions, and a strong commitment to territorial analysis and control form the foundations of 037 Technology and Security.
about.p2: Research-driven technologies are at the core of Guardian, a patented and unique solution: powered or self-powered devices that are dynamic, flexible, and fully autonomous, produced in two versions: Guardian and Guardian X-Ten.
about.p3: Today, 037 Technology and Security stands among the global leaders in the development of bespoke projects for high-profile clients, delivering innovative technical solutions that redefine the standards of perimeter security.
about.experienceText: Over twenty years in the security sector allow us to deliver proven and reliable solutions.
about.innovationText: Continuous research into cutting-edge materials and technologies for increasingly effective solutions.
about.reliabilityText: Patented and field-tested systems ensuring maximum security in every operational condition.
about.ctaText: Explore Guardian and Matrix, our patented technologies for perimeter security.

hero.title: GUARDIAN
hero.subtitle: Patented mobile technology station for perimeter security of large areas

description.p1: Guardian is a mobile technology station with its own power and connectivity, compact and inaccessible, with a telescopic column that can reach 13 meters high in seconds.
description.p2: On top are ready-to-use intelligent thermal cameras, radar, and LED lights that allow to see, sense, and record information for local and remote intelligence, and to rationalize and transmit data to multiple security sectors (Dual Use Technologies).
description.p3: Guardian is a patented and fully integrated technological innovation for perimeter security of large areas providing ready-to-use surveillance capabilities.

features.Title: Technical features
features.Radar Integrato: Advanced radar system for 360° perimeter detection
features.Visione Termica: Intelligent thermal cameras for night vision and anomaly detection
features.Autoalimentato: Autonomous power system with solar panels and high-capacity batteries
features.Altezza 13 metri: Telescopic column that reaches 13m high in a few seconds
features.Connettività Propria: Independent communication system for real-time data transmission
features.Dual Use Technologies: Data storage and rationalization for local and remote intelligence
features.Illuminazione LED: High-power LED lights for complete perimeter illumination
features.Compatto e Inaccessibile: Protected and inaccessible base, resistant to tampering and extreme conditions

guardian.title: GUARDIAN
guardian.description: Standard version with external power supply. Ideal for permanent or semi-permanent installations with access to electricity.

guardian_x_ten.title: GUARDIAN X-TEN
guardian_x_ten.description: Fully autonomous self-powered version. Perfect for remote areas, temporary missions, and situations without energy infrastructure.
